title: Senior Engineering Manager, Core Data Processing
description: Like Google's own ambitions, the work of a Software Engineer goes way beyond just Search. Software Engineering Managers have not only the technical expertise to take on and provide technical leadership to major projects, but also manage a team of engineers.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 8 years of experience with software development in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript). 5 years of experience in a technical leadership role; overseeing projects, with 5 years of experience in a people management, supervision/team leadership role.
preferred_qualifications: Master's degree or PhD in Computer Science or a related technical field. 5 years of experience working in an organization.
responsibilities: Lead, manage, and grow teams of engineers, mentor and coach managers and engineers on the team, and help grow and develop their skills. Manage the day-to-day operations of the team, including hiring, performance management, and career development. Contribute to the strategic direction by working with cross-functional teams. Contribute to the development and maintenance of data processing products and data analytics/Machine Learning solutions. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends in data processing, data analytics, and AI/ML.
